2.1.2. Details

POST /api/v1/inboundmapping

Endpoint for Inbound DID Rule Mapping

PUT /api/v1/inboundmapping

Endpoint for Inbound DID Rule Mapping

GET /api/v1/inboundmapping

Endpoint for Inbound DID Rule Mapping

DELETE /api/v1/inboundmapping

Endpoint for Inbound DID Rule Mapping

POST /api/v1/notification/gwgroup

Endpoint for Sending Notifications

PUT /api/v1/endpointgroups/(int: gwgroupid)
PUT /api/v1/endpointgroups

Update a single Endpoint Group

The gwgroupid can be provided in url path or payload

2.1. Request Payload

{
    name: <string>,
    calllimit: <int>,
    auth: {
        type: "ip"|"userpwd",
        user: <string>
        pass: <string>
        domain: <string>
    },
    endpoints [
        {
            gwid:<int>,
            hostname:<string>,
            description:<string>
            weight:<string>
        },
        ...
    ],
    strip: <int>,
    prefix: <string>,
    notifications: {
        overmaxcalllimit: <string>,
        endpointfailure: <string>
    },
    cdr: {
        cdr_email: <string>,
        cdr_send_interval: <string>
    }
    fusionpbx: {
        enabled: <bool>,
        dbhost: <string>,
        dbuser: <string>,
        dbpass: <string>
    }
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            endpoints: [
                <int>,
                ...
            ]
        }
    ]
}
POST /api/v1/endpointgroups

Add a single Endpoint Group

2.1. Request Payload

{
    name: <string>,
    calllimit: <int>,
    auth: {
        type: "ip"|"userpwd",
        user: <string>
        pass: <string>
        domain: <string>
    },
    endpoints [
        {
            hostname:<string>,
            description:<string>
            weight:<string>
        },
        ...
    ],
    strip: <int>,
    prefix: <string>,
    notifications: {
        overmaxcalllimit: <string>,
        endpointfailure: <string>
    },
    cdr: {
        cdr_email: <string>,
        cdr_send_interval: <string>
    }
    fusionpbx: {
        enabled: <bool>,
        dbhost: <string>,
        dbuser: <string>,
        dbpass: <string>
    }
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            endpoints: [
                <int>,
                ...
            ]
        }
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/numberenrichment/(int: rule_id)
GET /api/v1/numberenrichment

Get one or multiple number enrichment rules

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>,
            dnid: <str>,
            country_code: <str>,
            routing_number: <str>,
            rule_name: <str>
        },
        ...
    ]
}
POST /api/v1/numberenrichment

Add a one or multiple enrichment rules

2.1. Request Payload

{
    data: [
        {
            dnid: <str>,
            country_code: <str>,
            routing_number: <str>,
            rule_name: <str>
        },
        ...
    ]
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>
        },
        ...
    ]
}
PUT /api/v1/numberenrichment/(int: rule_id)
PUT /api/v1/numberenrichment

Update one or multiple enrichment rules

The rule_id can be provided in url path or payload

2.1. Request Payload

{
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>
            dnid: <str>,
            country_code: <str>,
            routing_number: <str>,
            rule_name: <str>
        },
        ...
    ]
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>
        },
        ...
    ]
}
DELETE /api/v1/numberenrichment/(int: rule_id)
DELETE /api/v1/numberenrichment

Delete one or multiple enrichment rules

The rule_id can be provided in url path or payload

2.1. Request Payload

{
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>
        },
        ...
    ]
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: []
}
POST /api/v1/numberenrichment/fetch

Fetch a CSV to import from an external server

Updates and adds rules by default

If replace_rules is True then current rules are replaced

2.1. Request Payload

{
    data: [
        {
            url: <str>
        },
        ...
    ],
    replace_rules: <bool>
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>,
            dnid: <str>,
            country_code: <str>,
            routing_number: <str>,
            rule_name: <str>
        },
        ...
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/cdrs/endpointgroups/(int: gwgroupid)

Purpose

Getting the cdrs for a gatewaygroup

GET /api/v1/cdrs/endpoint/(int: gwid)

Purpose

Getting the cdrs for a gateway thats part of a gateway group

GET /api/v1/backupandrestore/backup

Generate a backup of the database

POST /api/v1/backupandrestore/restore

Restore backup of the database

GET /api/v1/sys/generatepassword

Generate a random password

POST /api/v1/certificates

Create TLS cert for a domain

2.1. Request Payload
{

domain: <string>, ip: <int>, port: <int> server_name_mode: <int>

}

PUT /api/v1/certificates

Create TLS cert for a domain

2.1. Request Payload
{

domain: <string>, ip: <int>, port: <int> server_name_mode: <int>

}

GET /api/v1/mediaserver/domain/(string: config_id)/(string: domain_id)
GET /api/v1/mediaserver/domain/(string: config_id)
GET /api/v1/mediaserver/domain/

List all of the domains on a PBX

If the PBX only contains a single domain then it will return the hostname or ip address of the system. If the PBX is multi-tenant then a list of all domains will be returned

2.1. Request Payload

{}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        domains: [
            {
            domain_id: <int>,
            name: <string>,
            enabled: <string>,
            description: <string>
            }
        ]
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/mediaserver/extension/(string: config_id)/(string: domain_id)/(string: extension_id)
GET /api/v1/mediaserver/extension/(string: config_id)/(string: domain_id)

List all of the domains on a PBX

If the PBX only contains a single domain then it will return the hostname or ip address of the system. If the PBX is multi-tenant then a list of all domains will be returned

2.1. Request Payload

{}

2.1. Response Payload
{

“data”: [

[
{

“call_timeout”: null, “domain_uuid”: “51f66016-c2d5-4bd8-8117-29c8fc8ffa17”, “enabled”: “true”, “extensions_id”: “ae3cb4b8-f467-4a13-9bb8-9296226c1887”, “number”: “504”, “user_context”: “restaurant.detroitpbx.com”

}

]

}

DELETE /api/v1/carriergroups/(string: id)

List all Carrier Groups

2.1. Request Payload

{}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        carriergroups: [
            {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            name: <string>,
            gwlist: <string>
            }
        ]
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/carriergroups/(string: id)
GET /api/v1/carriergroups

List all Carrier Groups

2.1. Request Payload

{}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        carriergroups: [
            {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            name: <string>,
            gwlist: <string>
            }
        ]
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/carriergroups/plugin/(string: plugin_name)/config

Will return meta data about the plug

2.1. Request Payload

{}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    authfields: [],
    config <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        carriergroups: [
            {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            name: <string>,
            gwlist: <string>
            }
        ]
    ]
}
PUT /api/v1/carriergroups/(string: id)
PUT /api/v1/carriergroups

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            endpoints: [
                <int>,
                ...
            ]
        }
    ]
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            gwgroupid: <int>,

GET /api/v1/licensing/validate

Validate a License

2.1. Request Arguments

license_key=<string>
key_encrypted=<bool>

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        <bool>
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/licensing/retrieve

Retrieve details about a License

2.1. Request Arguments

license_key=<string>
key_encrypted=<bool>

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            license_key: <string>
            type: <string>
            expires: <string>
            active: <bool>
            valid: <bool>
        }
    ]
}
GET /api/v1/licensing/list

Retrieve details about all License’s associated to this node

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            license_key: <string>
            type: <string>
            expires: <string>
            active: <bool>
            valid: <bool>
        },
        ...
    ]
}
PUT /api/v1/licensing/activate

Activate a License

2.1. Request Payload

{
    license_key: <string>,
    key_encrypted: <bool>
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            license_key: <string>
            type: <string>
            expires: <string>
            active: <bool>
            valid: <bool>
        }
    ]
}
PUT /api/v1/licensing/deactivate

Deactivate a License

2.1. Request Payload

{
    license_key: <string>,
    key_encrypted: <bool>
}

2.1. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: []
}
GET /docs/(path: filename)

The view function used to serve files from static_folder. A route is automatically registered for this view at static_url_path if static_folder is set.

New in version 0.5.

GET /carriergroups/(int: gwgroup)
GET /carriergroups

Display the carrier groups in the view :param gwgroup:

POST /carriergroups

Add or Update a group of carriers

POST /carriergroupdelete

Delete a group of carriers

GET /carriers/group/(int: gwgroup)
GET /carriers/(int: gwid)
GET /carriers

Display the carriers table :param gwid: :param gwgroup: :param newgwid:

POST /carriers

Add or Update a carrier

POST /carrierdelete

Delete a carrier

GET /endpointgroups

Display Endpoint Groups / Endpoints in the view

GET /numberenrichment

Display Endpoint Groups / Endpoints in the view

GET /cdrs

Display Endpoint Groups / Endpoints in the view

GET /licensing

Display License Manager page

POST /endpointgroups

Add or Update a PBX / Endpoint

POST /pbxdelete

Delete a PBX / Endpoint

GET /inboundmapping

Displaying of dr_rules table (inbound routes only)

Partially Supports rule definitions for Kamailio Drouting module

Documentation: Drouting module

POST /inboundmapping

Adding and Updating of dr_rules table (inbound routes only)

Partially Supports rule definitions for Kamailio Drouting module

Documentation: Drouting module

POST /inboundmappingdelete

Deleting of dr_rules table (inbound routes only)

Partially Supports rule definitions for Kamailio Drouting module

Documentation: Drouting module

GET /teleblock

Display teleblock settings in view

POST /teleblock

Update teleblock config file settings

GET /transnexus

Display TransNexus settings in view

POST /transnexus

Update TransNexus config file settings

GET /outboundroutes

Displaying of dr_rules table (outbound routes only)

Supports rule definitions for Kamailio Drouting module

Documentation: Drouting module

POST /outboundroutes

Adding and Updating dr_rules table (outbound routes only)

Supports rule definitions for Kamailio Drouting module

Documentation: Drouting module

POST /outboundroutesdelete

Deleting of dr_rules table (outbound routes only)

Supports rule definitions for Kamailio Drouting module

Documentation: Drouting module

GET /stirshaken

Display TransNexus settings in view

POST /stirshaken

Update STIR/SHAKEN config file settings

GET /upgrade

Display Upgrade settings in view
